Package org.red5.server.tomcat

Class TomcatVHostLoader

java.lang.Object
org.red5.server.LoaderBase
org.red5.server.tomcat.TomcatLoader
org.red5.server.tomcat.TomcatVHostLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoaderMXBean, ShutdownMXBean, TomcatVHostLoaderMXBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
@ManagedResource(objectName="org.red5.server:type=TomcatVHostLoader", description="TomcatVHostLoader") public class TomcatVHostLoader extends TomcatLoader implements TomcatVHostLoaderMXBean
Red5 loader for Tomcat virtual hosts.
Author:
Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
